topic.title: Coded Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

section.p: The vital signs section contains coded measurement results of a patient's vital signs.

ol.li: Conforms to Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.25)

SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1)
Conforms to CCD Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.16)
Conforms to Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.25)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "8716-3" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1)
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'vital signs'.
